name: Bloodtype Coffee
description:
LUDUM DARE 41 - TIMCO

Bloodtype Coffee is an 2D/3D switching game!  

You start a normal day in office but...

after a whole night of work you better loot the coffee machine to save yourself from unconsciousness! In Bloodtype Coffee you have your hardest coffein shock ever in your life. 

Game:

You control an normal office man. Trink coffee on a coffee machine. But you need coins to buy your coffee. When your caffeine scale is to low you will die. Game over!

Highscore is the distance you walk in the office.

Controls:

 "E" - CHANGE 2D / 3D

 2D

"W" - JUMP

"D" - WALK RIGHT

"SPACE" -  DRINK COFFEE

3D

"W A S D"  - TO WALK

"LEFT CLICK"  - SHOOT
